title: Raps Management Case Study
description: Case Study: Discover how Jayson Hunter helped Raps Management improve their online brand and position with a new custom built website.

caseStudyDetails.projectDescription: Based in London, Raps Management LTD is a leading UK based talent management company, representing a select list of clients in the sport, media and entertainment sectors. They wanted to improve their online brand and position with a new custom built website.
